q1: How do YouTube tags help SEO?
a1: Tags help YouTube understand your video's topic and recommend it to relevant audiences. Use a mix of broad and specific tags.
q2: How many tags should I use?
a2: YouTube allows up to 500 characters of tags. Aim for 15-30 relevant tags mixing broad topics and long-tail keywords.
q3: What makes a good YouTube title?
a3: Good titles are under 60 characters, include the main keyword, create curiosity, and accurately represent the content.
